import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; function CartModal() { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('cart')}

{t('product')}
  • {t('cost')}:
    {/* */}

{t('total')} 0 {t('items')} {t('totalCost')}

0 BYN

{t('checkout')}
); } export default CartModal;
